tool_description: Monitors transaction status across multiple gateways in real-time, tracking pending payments and providing status updates for transaction lifecycle management.

transaction_ids.description: List of transaction IDs to monitor

monitoring_duration_minutes.description: How long to monitor transactions in minutes

check_interval_seconds.description: Interval between status checks in seconds

error_messages: Invalid transaction IDs: One or more transaction IDs are not found in the system.
Monitoring duration too long: monitoring_duration_minutes cannot exceed 1440 (24 hours).
Check interval too frequent: check_interval_seconds must be at least 10 seconds.
Too many transactions: Cannot monitor more than 100 transactions simultaneously.
usage: Provide transaction IDs to monitor their status across gateways. Set appropriate monitoring_duration_minutes and check_interval_seconds based on expected transaction completion times.

monitored_transactions.description: Transaction IDs that were successfully monitored

current_statuses.description: Current status of each monitored transaction

status_changes.description: Status changes detected during monitoring period

completed_count.description: Number of transactions that completed during monitoring
